description: Episode number 1 of Series "Dynamics of leadership". Illustrates the structure of a group, the goals to be achieved during meetings, participation patterns, the quality of communication, group standards, and group procedures. Discusses the difference between a collection of individuals and a group, and the means of getting a new group off to a good start.
